articles.title: All app updates submitted to Google Play are now required to target Android 10 and above - XDA Developers
articles.description: Google now mandates that all existing apps that get updated on the Play Store now target Android 10 (API level 29) or higher.
articles.content: Google has once again shifted its target API level requirement for all apps submitted to Google Play. Since August 3, 2020, all new apps submitted to Google Play were required to target at least Andr… [+1730 chars]
